privacy_policy_description: Learn how Wellio collects, uses, and protects your personal data
terms_description: Terms and conditions for using Wellio
intro_text: Welcome to Wellio. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our fitness and wellness application.
collect_fitness: Workout logs, exercise routines, and activity data
collect_nutrition: Nutrition logs, meal plans, and dietary preferences
collect_measurements: Body measurements, weight, and health metrics
collect_usage: App usage patterns and feature interactions
use_provide_service: To provide and maintain our fitness tracking services
use_personalize: To personalize your experience and recommendations
use_ai_insights: To generate AI-powered fitness insights (with your consent)
use_communicate: To communicate with you about updates and features
use_improve: To improve our services and develop new features
use_security: To ensure the security of your account and data
security_intro: We implement industry-leading security measures to protect your data:
security_audit: Comprehensive audit logging for sensitive data access
security_rls: Row-level security policies for data isolation
rights_intro: Under GDPR and other privacy regulations, you have the following rights:
right_access_desc: Request a copy of all personal data we hold about you
right_rectify_desc: Request correction of inaccurate personal data
right_erasure_desc: Request deletion of your personal data
right_portability_desc: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format
right_withdraw_desc: Withdraw consent for data processing at any time
retention_text: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, or as required by law. You can configure your preferred data retention period in your Privacy Controls settings.
third_parties_intro: We may share data with trusted third parties for specific purposes:
third_party_hosting: Cloud infrastructure providers for data storage (encrypted at rest)
third_party_payments: Payment processors for subscription billing (PCI-DSS compliant)
contact_text: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us at:
acceptance_text: By accessing or using Wellio, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
account_age: You must be at least 13 years old to use this service
account_accurate: You must provide accurate and complete information
account_secure: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account
account_responsibility: You are responsible for all activities under your account
acceptable_intro: You agree to use Wellio responsibly and in accordance with these guidelines:
use_lawful: Use the service only for lawful purposes
use_accurate_data: Provide accurate health and fitness data
use_respect: Respect other users in community features
use_no_spam: Do not send spam or unsolicited messages
prohibited_illegal: Engaging in illegal activities or promoting violence
prohibited_harassment: Harassing, bullying, or threatening other users
payments_intro: Premium features require a paid subscription:
payments_billing: Subscriptions are billed on a recurring basis
payments_renewal: Subscriptions auto-renew unless cancelled before the renewal date
payments_cancel: You can cancel your subscription at any time from Settings
payments_refund: Refunds are provided in accordance with applicable consumer protection laws
health_disclaimer_text: IMPORTANT: Wellio is a fitness tracking and wellness application, NOT a medical device or service.
health_not_medical: Content and features are for informational purposes only
health_consult: Always consult qualified healthcare professionals before making health decisions
health_emergency: In case of medical emergency, contact emergency services immediately
ip_text: All content, features, and functionality of Wellio are owned by us and protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You retain ownership of content you create but grant us a license to use it for providing our services.
termination_text: We may terminate or suspend your account at any time for violations of these terms. You may delete your account at any time through Privacy Controls. Upon termination, your data will be deleted according to our retention policies.
liability_text: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Wellio shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of the service. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid for the service in the past 12 months.
governing_law_text: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which our company is registered, without regard to conflict of law principles.
changes_text: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or in-app notification. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
